name: Pollen Collect
description:
This was made for the brackey's game jam in about 4 hours! haha and uploaded at the last possible minute find the pollen and avoid the fake flowers! 
Technically this is the first-ever propper game jam I have done! (others have just been with friends for fun with no real-time limit) after joining late and then having my day job  thrust hours upon me I feel I did well  but  this is not my best work and  will most likely  take time off work when doing my next game jam anyways I hope you enjoy
